block.p: More than two weeks after suicide bombers tore a hole in its hull while it lay in the port of Aden, the maimed American destroyer Cole limped out to sea, where it was taken aboard a floating drydock for shipment back to the United States for repairs. The ship left Yemeni waters with its battle ensign flying and the sound system blaring music that ranged from ''The Star Spangled Banner'' to rap. In Washington, defense officials said other Navy vessels had been told to avoid the Suez Canal for fear of another terrorist attack.

The ship left Yemeni waters with its battle ensign flying and the sound system blaring music that ranged from ''The Star Spangled Banner'' to rap. In Washington, defense officials said other Navy vessels had been told to avoid the Suez Canal for fear of another terrorist attack.
